attributes.action: Minimum 3 year prison Sentence for attacks on frontline workers.
attributes.additional_details: We clap for heroic frontline workers but when they are attacked in the line of duty they don’t get a prison sentence in most cases
attributes.background: Make any attack that injures a police officer or other frontline worker carry a minimum 3 year prison sentence

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309432
